verses.verse: "At this<WH384> also<WH637> my heart<WH3820> trembles,<WH2729> And leaps<WH9351> from its place.<WH4725>
"Listen<WH8085> closely<WH8085> to the thunder<WH7267> of His voice,<WH6963> And the rumbling<WH1899> that goes<WH3318> out from His mouth.<WH6310>
"Under<WH8478> the whole<WH3605> heaven<WH8064> He lets<WH8281> it loose,<WH8281> And His lightning<WH216> to the ends<WH3671> of the earth.<WH776>
"After<WH310> it, a voice<WH6963> roars;<WH7580> He thunders<WH7481> with His majestic<WH1347> voice;<WH6963> And He does not restrain<WH6117> the lightnings when His voice<WH6963> is heard.<WH8085>
"God<WH410> thunders<WH7481> with His voice<WH6963> wondrously,<WH6381> Doing<WH6213> great<WH1419> things<WH1419> which we cannot<WH3808> comprehend.<WH3045>
"For to the snow<WH7950> He says,<WH559> 'Fall<WH9094> on the earth,<WH776>' And to the downpour<WH1653> <WH4306> and the rain,<WH1653> <WH4306> 'Be strong.<WH5797>'
"He seals<WH2856> the hand<WH3027> of every<WH3605> man,<WH120> That all<WH3605> men<WH376> may know<WH3045> His work.<WH4639>
"Then the beast<WH9130> goes<WH935> into its lair,<WH695> And remains<WH7931> in its den.<WH4585>
"Out of the south<WH2315> comes<WH935> the storm,<WH5492> And out of the north<WH2219> the cold.<WH7135>
"From the breath<WH5397> of God<WH410> ice<WH7140> is made,<WH5414> And the expanse<WH7341> of the waters<WH4325> is frozen.<WH4164>
"Also<WH637> with moisture<WH7377> He loads<WH2959> the thick<WH5645> cloud;<WH5645> He disperses<WH6327> the cloud<WH6051> of His lightning.<WH216>

"And it changes<WH4524> direction,<WH4524> turning<WH2015> around<WH2015> by His guidance,<WH8458> That it may do<WH6466> whatever<WH3605> <WH834> He commands<WH6680> it On the face<WH6440> of the inhabited<WH8398> earth.<WH776>
"Whether<WH518> for correction,<WH7626> or<WH518> for His world,<WH776> Or<WH518> for lovingkindness,<WH2617> He causes it to happen.<WH4672>
"Listen<WH238> to this,<WH384> O Job,<WH347> Stand<WH5975> and consider<WH995> the wonders<WH6381> of God.<WH410>
"Do you know<WH3045> how God<WH433> establishes<WH7760> them, And makes the lightning<WH216> of His cloud<WH6051> to shine<WH3313>?
"Do you know<WH3045> about<WH5921> the layers<WH4657> of the thick<WH5645> clouds,<WH5645> The wonders<WH4652> of one perfect<WH8549> in knowledge,<WH1843>
You whose<WH834> garments<WH899> are hot,<WH2525> When the land<WH776> is still<WH8252> because<WH4480> of the south<WH1864> wind?
"Can you, with Him, spread<WH7554> out the skies,<WH7834> Strong<WH2389> as a molten<WH3332> mirror<WH7209>?
"Teach<WH3045> us what<WH4100> we shall say<WH559> to Him; We cannot<WH3808> arrange<WH6186> [our case] because<WH4480> <WH6440> of darkness.<WH2822>
"Shall it be told<WH5608> Him that I would speak<WH1696>? Or<WH518> should a man<WH376> say<WH559> that he would be swallowed<WH1104> up?
"And now<WH6258> men do not see<WH7200> the light<WH216> which<WH1931> is bright<WH925> in the skies;<WH7834> But the wind<WH7307> has passed<WH5674> and cleared<WH2891> them.
"Out of the north<WH6828> comes<WH857> golden<WH2091> [splendor;] Around<WH5921> God<WH433> is awesome<WH3372> majesty.<WH1935>

"The Almighty<WH7706> â€“ we cannot<WH3808> find<WH4672> Him; He is exalted<WH7689> in power;<WH3581> And He will not do<WH6031> violence<WH6031> to justice<WH4941> and abundant<WH7230> righteousness.<WH6666>
"Therefore<WH3651> men<WH376> fear<WH3372> Him; He does not regard<WH7200> any<WH3605> who are wise<WH2450> of heart.<WH3820>"
